column2: "Guh... haa... haa...! My strength, it's being shaved away... is this... the power of that person?"
"Damn you! Damn you ARKS! Being disgraced like this... me... me...!"
"Fufu... But still! I...! If I'm still alive, the path to omniscience isn't closed yet!"
"...no, Luther. Your path ends here."
"Re...gius...? You... why are you here...?"
"It's a long story. You just thought you did us all in, you bastard."
"Fu... fufu... Then, that's great timing! Collaborate with me, Regius! Cooperate! Lend me your power! For omniscience!"
"To understand everything, huh...? Luther, what will you accomplish when you achieve that?"
"Don't question the value of a scientist's studies! To know all.., that's my existence's meaning, the value of my existence!"
"For that reason... for Alma."
"Alma? Ah, the first Claris Claes!"
"That's right, that's right! Regius! Here's a condition, to resurrect her!"
"I can gather that data! With my... with Dark Falz [Loser]'s power, it's simple!"
"Dark Falz... [Loser]."
"What? You're surprised this late in the game? You should have suspected it a little, yes? Realizing that, you still obeyed, right?"
"Yes, despite suspicions, in order to protect this trifling peace... nothing could be done, foolishly."
"Clinging to a phantom of the past long lost, a fool. That was me... No, that was the Three Heroes."
"...But, that ends here."
"Re... Regius...?"
"Luther, you said it yourself. Myself and this sword exist to extinguish Darkers. Then... Now is that time!"
"End it, Genesis."
"Alma... This will return the ARKS to how you wished it would be."
"...Maria."
"Really, you're old, so you shouldn't try the impossible."
"Look who's talking."
"Coming here was a last resort. Let's hurry up and return to Xiao."
"Even though you said this and that, you got done in by these weaklings. You even tried to copy us."
"The first match has the monkey imitator as the loser, huh. Slovenly, huh? Boring, huh?"
"What, they...?! When did they get there...?!"
"That's right. Let's give them imitations. To play some more."
"Yeah. Let's give them imitations. Let's play some more."
"[Loser]... they ate him...?"
"This is... a [Loser] mimic! Did they just create something like a Dark Falz...?!"
"Hey, everyone. Let's play a little."
"Here's some good toys."
"What are these guys...?! Their strength is crazy...!"
"Kyaa!"
"Great timing! Regius, we're retreating!"
"Understood!"
"Ah, they ran. You guys, pathetic."
"Ah, they ran away. You people, careless."
"But, this place is interesting."
"It reminds me of that kid from 10 years ago. That transparent, shining glitter... was so pretty."
"If it's transparent, we have to corrupt it. Everyone's demanding fights."
"If it's pretty, we need to dirty it. We should fight like everyone wishes."
"Every, everything, pollute it."
"Every, everyone, contaminate them."
"If we do that, the photons will go away."
"If we do that, the ARKS will go away."
"Pollute everything to become one."
"Corrupt everything to become one."
"Not fighting, but living on."
"While having fun, let's pollute?"
"While sporting, let's corrupt?"
"Fufu, ahaha, ufufuhaha!"
